briefTitle: Genetic Testing to Improve Management of Patients Undergoing Breast Biopsy
officialTitle: Genetic Testing to Improve Management of Patients Undergoing Breast Biopsy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of subjects consented per month
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* \* Women over the age of 18 years

  * Able to provide informed consent
  * Referred for a radiologically guided breast biopsy

Exclusion Criteria:

* \* Men

  * Women under the age of 18 years
  * Unable to provide informed consent
